description: Big city Sendai: lots to do and lots to see. The largest city in the north east Tohoku Region of Japan, Sendai was a drastic change in environment. Ishinomaki was quiet and full of nature, whereas Sendai was packed with people and skyscrapers. Everyone inhabiting Sendai should know of Date Masamune, a daimy≈ç (or Japanese feudal lord) the founder of the city.
locations: Zuihoden Mausoleum, Sendai Daikannon, Sendai Castle Ruins, Miyagi Museum of Art
